author: A_Brickset_user
title: Jailbreak Joe escapes....
review:
Can they catch him.  You bet? 
This set is great but there are a few problems.  The helicopter is wimpy, no windshield.  With the prisoner transport truck, the "bars" pop out too easy and you have to open the roof to ge the cop out.  Overall, its a good set.

author: diehardlegofan
title: Best police set ever
review: This set is a classic.  It's the one that started it all!  Whoever doesn't like this is not a true fan of LEGO.  Jailbreak Joe is a classic mini figure.  Gotta love it.  Five stars.  Keep on bricking.
